entry.title: IoT Firmware Emulation with QEMU
entry.summary: Way to emulate IoT(home router, NAS, ipcam) firmware with QEMU 목차 목차 Installation Run QEMU Firmware Emulation References Installation 주의!! 설치할 펌웨어를 미리 까본 후(fmk 사용) file bin/busybox 명령을 통해 해당 바이너리가 Little/Big Endian인지 확인해야 한다! Little Endian(LSB)라면 mipsel, Big Endian(MSB)라면 mips vmlinux/hda를 다운로드받으면 된다. Example) busybox: ELF 32-bit LSB executable, MIPS, MIPS32 rel2 version 1...
